title: Toy Story
plot: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.
stars: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles

title: Heat
plot: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.
stars: Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Val Kilmer

title: Casino
plot: A tale of greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends: a mafia enforcer and a casino executive, compete against each other over a gambling empire, and over a fast living and fast loving socialite.
stars: Robert De Niro, Sharon Stone, Joe Pesci

title: Se7en
plot: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.
stars: Morgan Freeman, Brad Pitt, Kevin Spacey

title: The Usual Suspects
plot: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.
stars: Kevin Spacey, Gabriel Byrne, Chazz Palminteri

title: La haine
plot: 24 hours in the lives of three young men in the French suburbs the day after a violent riot.
stars: Vincent Cassel, Hubert Koundé, Saïd Taghmaoui

title: Braveheart
plot: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, William Wallace begins a revolt against King Edward I of England.
stars: Mel Gibson, Sophie Marceau, Patrick McGoohan

plot: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action by attempting to liberate a presidential campaign worker and an underage prostitute.
stars: Robert De Niro, Jodie Foster, Cybill Shepherd

title: Before Sunrise
plot: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.
stars: Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy, Andrea Eckert

title: Star Wars
plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.
stars: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher

title: Léon
plot: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. Léon and Mathilda form an unusual relationship, as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.
stars: Jean Reno, Gary Oldman, Natalie Portman

title: Pulp Fiction
plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
stars: John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson

title: Trois couleurs: Rouge
plot: A model discovers her neighbor is keen on invading people's privacy.
stars: Irène Jacob, Jean-Louis Trintignant, Frédérique Feder

plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
stars: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton

plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.
stars: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise

title: The Lion King
plot: A Lion cub crown prince is tricked by a treacherous uncle into thinking he caused his father's death and flees into exile in despair, only to learn in adulthood his identity and his responsibilities.

stars: Daniel Day-Lewis, Pete Postlethwaite, Alison Crosbie

title: Jurassic Park
plot: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.
stars: Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum

stars: Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes, Ben Kingsley

stars: Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young

plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son, John Connor, from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.
stars: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Edward Furlong

stars: Jodie Foster, Anthony Hopkins, Lawrence A. Bonney

plot: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.
stars: William H. Macy, Frances McDormand, Steve Buscemi

plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a War Room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

stars: Ewan McGregor, Ewen Bremner, Jonny Lee Miller

plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
stars: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan

plot: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.
stars: Gene Kelly, Donald O'Connor, Debbie Reynolds

title: Vertigo
plot: A former police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with a hauntingly beautiful woman.

stars: Clark Gable, Claudette Colbert, Walter Connolly

title: Some Like It Hot
plot: When two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

title: Casablanca

stars: Humphrey Bogart, Ingrid Bergman, Paul Henreid

title: The Maltese Falcon

stars: Clark Gable, Vivien Leigh, Thomas Mitchell

plot: Following the death of a publishing tycoon, news reporters scramble to discover the meaning of his final utterance.

plot: After discovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the lunar surface, mankind sets off on a quest to find its origins with help from intelligent supercomputer HAL 9000.

title: All About Eve
plot: An ingenue insinuates herself into the company of an established but aging stage actress and her circle of theater friends.
stars: Bette Davis, Anne Baxter, George Sanders

stars: Laurence Olivier, Joan Fontaine, George Sanders

title: It's a Wonderful Life

stars: Bruce Willis, Alan Rickman, Bonnie Bedelia

plot: A young soldier in Vietnam faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.
stars: Charlie Sheen, Tom Berenger, Willem Dafoe

plot: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

plot: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

plot: A criminal pleads insanity after getting into trouble again and once in the mental institution rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.
stars: Jack Nicholson, Louise Fletcher, Will Sampson

plot: After the rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader.

plot: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy a more powerful Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
